citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:30 am on
13-DEC-17.The licensee was contacted by phone and could not accompany during the inspection because of
illness.
